label: The use of a cluster placement group is ideal _______

choices.value: Your fleet of EC2 instances requires high network throughput and low latency within a single availability zone.
When you need to deploy EC2 instances that require high disk IO.
When you need to distribute content on a CDN network.
Your fleet of EC2 Instances requires low latency and high network throughput across multiple availability zones.

label: To retrieve instance metadata or user data you will need to use the following IP Address:
When creating a new security group, all inbound traffic is allowed by default.
If an Amazon EBS volume is an additional partition (not the root volume), can I detach it without stopping the instance?

choices.value: No, you will need to stop the instance.
Yes, although it may take some time.
